title: The Bell Ringers Podcast: Earnings Season Special
text:
Join Investing.com senior analysts Jesse Cohen and Clement Thibault in a special Bell Ringers episode as they review the most significant earnings releases to rock financial markets last week and discuss the likely top earnings reports for the week ahead.

The format is simple: the duo spends two minutes talking about a stock; the bell sounds when time is up, whereupon they move on to the next stock.

You can listen to the episode on Spotify here: https://open.spotify.com/episode/1OE154bLUHudruLDpho7yA

This week’s earnings season extravaganza kicks off with: thoughts on last week’s results from big names like (NASDAQ: ) (01:30-04:20), (NASDAQ: ) (04:20-06:50), (NASDAQ: ) (06:50-09:30), (NYSE: ) (09:30-12:00) and (NYSE: ) (12:00-15:00).

Turning attention to the week ahead, the two provide thoughts on what to anticipate from this week’s busy batch of earnings, including (NASDAQ: ) (15:00-18:00), (NASDAQ: ) (18:00-20:40), Google parent (NASDAQ: ) (20:40-23:00), (NYSE: ) (23:00-25:45) and (NASDAQ: ) (25:45-29:20).

To close, they each provide a stock of the week: Shopify (NYSE: ) for Jesse (29:20-31:20) and Kraft Heinz (NASDAQ: ) for Clement (31:20-33:20).

Find us on Twitter for feedback @Investingcom, @BellRingersPod, @JesseCohenInv, and @ClemThibault!
description: Market Overview Analysis by Investing.com (Bell Ringers/Investing.com) covering: Boeing Co, AT&T Inc, Microsoft Corporation, Kraft Heinz Co. Read Investing.com (Bell Ringers/Investing.com)'s latest article on Investing.com
